article_title: Taxes, health care top agenda for Idaho Legislature’s last week
article_text:
Important tax and health coverage bills get hearings starting Monday

Adjournment target is by Friday

In between, there’s much to do

article_metadata.news-keywords: Idaho Legislature, end of session, tax cuts, health care, Medicaid, uninsured, gap group, income tax, Moyle, Bart Davis, bible in the schools, REAL ID
article_metadata.description: Monday is the 71st day of the Idaho Legislature’s 2016 session. Lawmakers are hoping to wrap things up this week and hop on out of town in time for Easter. Before they do, there’s some heavy lifting ahead on taxes, health care for the uninsured, and an assortment of the usual last-minute loose legislative ends to tie up or toss out.
article_metadata.title: Taxes, health care top agenda for Idaho Legislature’s last week | Idaho Statesman
